verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*; (this \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* unto you for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \add even\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* with the \w coasts|strong="H1367"\w* thereof:)

Then your \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w quarter|strong="H6285"\w* shall be from the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w* along by the \w coast|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and your \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall be the outmost \w coast|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*:

And your \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* from the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* to the \w ascent|strong="H4608"\w* of \w Akrabbim|strong="H4610"\w*, and pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*: and the going \w forth|strong="H8444"\w* thereof shall be from the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* to \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*, and shall go \w on|strong="H3318"\w* to \w Hazar-addar|strong="H2692"\w*, and pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Azmon|strong="H6111"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall fetch a \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* from \w Azmon|strong="H6111"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of it shall be at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And \add as for\add* the \w western|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, ye shall even have the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* for a \w border|strong="H1366"\w*: this shall be your \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.

And this shall be your \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*: from the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* ye shall point \w out|strong="H8376"\w* for you \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*:

From \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w* ye shall point \w out|strong="H8376"\w* \add your border\add* unto the \w entrance|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*; and the goings \w forth|strong="H8444"\w* of the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall be to \w Zedad|strong="H6657"\w*:

Â¶ And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall go \w on|strong="H3318"\w* to \w Ziphron|strong="H2202"\w*, and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of it shall be at \w Hazar-enan|strong="H2704"\w*: this shall be your \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*.
And ye shall point \w out|strong="H0184"\w* your \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* from \w Hazar-enan|strong="H2704"\w* to \w Shepham|strong="H8221"\w*:

And the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* shall go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w Shepham|strong="H8221"\w* to \w Riblah|strong="H7247"\w*, on the east \w side|strong="H6924"\w* of \w Ain|strong="H5871"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall \w descend|strong="H3381"\w*, and shall \w reach|strong="H4229"\w* unto the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Chinnereth|strong="H3672"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*:\f + \fr 34.11 \ft side of the sea: Heb. shoulder of the sea\f*

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* shall go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of it shall be at the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: this shall be your \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with the \w coasts|strong="H1367"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which ye shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, and to the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*:

For the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7206"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1425"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \add their inheritance;\add* and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*:

The \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*, toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

These \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which shall \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto you: \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.

And ye shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of every \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, to \w divide|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* by \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.

And the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add are\add* these: Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*.
And of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w Shemuel|strong="H8050"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*.
Of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Elidad|strong="H0449"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chislon|strong="H3692"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w Bukki|strong="H1231"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jogli|strong="H3020"\w*.

The \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, for the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Hanniel|strong="H2592"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephod|strong="H0641"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Kemuel|strong="H7055"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shiphtan|strong="H8204"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Elizaphan|strong="H0469"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Parnach|strong="H6535"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Paltiel|strong="H6409"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azzan|strong="H5821"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, \w Ahihud|strong="H0282"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelomi|strong="H8015"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Pedahel|strong="H6300"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammihud|strong="H5989"\w*.

These \add are they\add* whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to divide the \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.
